thread.title: This incredible app lets you virtually walk your friends home so you know they’re safe
thread.title_full: This incredible app lets you virtually walk your friends home so you know they’re safe

title: This incredible app lets you virtually walk your friends home so you know they’re safe
text: This incredible app lets you virtually walk your friends home so you know they’re safe Saturday, 5 September 2015 (17 minutes ago) Friends don't let friends walk home alone, and now they don't have to, thanks to an ingenious new app called Companion that is finally addressing the much needed issue of late-night safety. Wheelchair Dog And Silkie Chicken Are The Cutest Friends 01:51 THIS two-legged chihuahua has found puppy love with a hot chick. The energetic pooch named Roo has become best friends with silkie chicken, Penny, after they were rescued and re-homed together. They now live with owner Alicia Williams at her house in Duluth, Georgia, and have become inseparable... You Might Like
